channel.title: Very common (and annoying) problem! (Invisible Pkers!) (Still doesn't work!)
channel.description:
Ok basically teleporting is great on my source, but when you teleport into a wilderness area after someone, they sometimes cannot see you for ages, I hate this problem because then when they teleport back out of the wilderness, they still cannot see some people at home. This happens with most sources I have used, but I have never seen it before on sources like Dodian, ZDR etc so there must be a fix, please leave your thoughts/comments/help below, this would be much appreciated.
Tobias222 :rolleyes: ;)

item.title: Very common (and annoying) problem! (Invisible Pkers!) (Still doesn't work!)
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Im using richscape 4 , I added that tut you told me to, and it still dont work…
Please help us.

The comment is my old one.

		plr.playerListSize = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
		if(!plr.playerList[i].didTeleport && !plr.didTeleport && plr.withinDistance(plr.playerList[i])) {
			//			if(!plr.didTeleport && !plr.playerList[i].didTeleport && plr.withinDistance(plr.playerList[i])) {
				plr.playerList[i].updatePlayerMovement(str);
				plr.playerList[i].appendPlayerUpdateBlock(updateBlock);
				plr.playerList[plr.playerListSize++] = plr.playerList[i];
			} else {
				int id = plr.playerList[i].playerId;
				plr.playerInListBitmap[id>>3] &= ~(1 << (id&7));
				str.writeBits(1, 1);
				str.writeBits(2, 3);
			}
		}

Read full topic
